activities:
Press Ganey, its subsidiaries and affiliates may receive personal information of EU/EEA or Switzerland residents from health care organizations for the purpose of providing clinical consulting, performance measurement, operational/financial analysis or other related services.

Press Ganey, its subsidiaries and affiliates may receive personal information of EU/EEA or Switzerland residents from employees, contractors or other related parties for the purposes of payroll and other human resources related activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client data that may include health information or other demographic information and individual employee information.
recoursemech: Press Ganey agrees to cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
